summary: 2002 INFINITY G20 PURCHASED BRAND NEW- 5/0. DRIVEN VERY INFREQUENTLY. SINCE 9/02 EXPERIENCED PROBLEMS W/ CAR PULLING TO ONE SIDE ON 2 SEPARATE OCCASIONS. DEALER CLAIMED 3 RIMS WERE BENT THE FIRST INCIDENT AND 2 BENT THE SECOND INSTANCE. SEEM HIGHLY UNLIKELY THAT A LUXURY CAR RIMS CAN BE BENT WITH SUCH LIMITED YET EXTREMELY CAREFUL DRIVING. DEALER GAVE NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE.  *NLM
